message.content:
Subject: Resignation from Position
Dear [Boss's Name],
I am writing to inform you that I have decided to resign from my position at [Company Name] effective two weeks from today, on [Last Working Day].
I want to thank you and the entire team for the opportunity to work with you all. It has been a pleasure to be part of this company, and I will miss our daily interactions and conversations.
Before I leave, I would like to take this opportunity to express my gratitude for the support and guidance that you have provided me throughout my tenure at [Company Name]. Your feedback and encouragement have helped me grow as an employee and achieve my professional goals.
I am committed to ensuring a smooth transition of my responsibilities to my successor. During the next two weeks, I will make every effort to complete all outstanding tasks, hand over any important documents or projects, and ensure that everything is in order.
Once again, thank you for the opportunity to work with you and [Company Name]. I wish you all the best in your future endeavors.
Sincerely,
[Your Name]
